mapper.insert: insert into dispatching( dispatching.dispatching_update_time, dispatching.dispatching_id, dispatching.dispatching_rider_id, dispatching.dispatching_state_id ) values( #{dispatchingUpdateTime}, #{dispatchingOrder.orderId}, #{dispatchingRider.riderId}, #{dispatchingState.stateId} )
mapper.select: SELECT dispatching.dispatching_id, dispatching.dispatching_rider_id, dispatching.dispatching_state_id, dispatching.dispatching_update_time FROM dispatching where dispatching.dispatching_delete_or_not=1 and dispatching.dispatching_id=#{dispatchingId}
